entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm.
